title: Client Crashed during champ select.
body: My client crashed during champs select. I logged back in immediately and went back into champ select. Then i kicked me and when i tried to go back into a game it says because i left the game i have to wait 5 minutes. I also lost lp for it. Can i get my lp back or am i just screwed.

replies.body: I'd like to help resolve whatever is causing you to crash, and prevent further penalties from [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) and [queue dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  Game stats or LP can't be adjusted, and the system will treat these cases equally because they still cause others a negative experience even if it wasn't intentional.  I need more information to understand what's going on though, like what you mean exactly by crashed.  Did you get any error messages?  What are you seeing and when is it happening?  Let me know!

It only happened one time. My league froze. Then it said league was not responding. It closed the client. So i reopened it. Logged back in. Went immediately back into champ selelct but all the icons were blank. I couldnt type in chat. I couldnt pick a champ or change summons or masteries or runes. then it kicked me out of the champ select and took me to the home page. This has never happened before.
